text: Thomas Ferguson McCormick (January 2, 1926 â€“ February 10, 2022) was an American politician. McCormick was born in Brooklyn, New York. He was elected to the New Hampshire House of Representatives in 2002 as a Republican, and lost his re-election bid in 2004. McCormick died on February 10, 2022, at the age of 96 at his home in New London, New Hampshire. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Members of the New Hampshire General Court Category:Politicians from Brooklyn Category:Politicians from New Hampshire Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Tom McCormick (politician)
